name: Rezonance
description:
Gaia is already powerful enough to discover the Celestial Wave needed to create a life-giving planet from the Ether but she’ll need your help to align the primal elements in such a way that their combined tone will resonate with the celestial wave.

The aim of the game is to reach the bright flat waveform of cosmic equilibrium.

Instructions:

  • Move the gems around to find the spot of balance. Pay attention to the effect the gem has on the background. There are two variables to take into consideration:
    • Rotation around center changes frequency.
    • Distance from center controls amplitude.
  • Once you have reached the critical configuration, press the spacebar to get Gaia's approval.
